author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tension prevailed on Theni-Periyakulam Main Road at Allinagaram after the cadres of the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam and the Desiya Murpokku Dravida Kazhagam almost clashed as the AIADMK functionaries tried to prevent DMDK party secretary Krishnamurthy from crossing the venue of Theni party workers’ meeting on Wednesday.

Mr. Krishnamurthy was going to his party office near the venue of the AIADMK meeting. When the AIADMK cadres stopped his car a few yards before the venue, the DMDK cadres congregated on the road and vociferously protested the action of the AIADMK cadres.

The situation turned worse when both the party cadres got ready for a clash with each other on the road. Road users and shopkeepers were in the grip of fear. Meanwhile, police officials pacified the party men and allowed the DMDK party functionary to leave the spot. Later, the members of the DMDK and its allies celebrated the formation of an alliance.
title: Face-off between AIADMK and DMDK cadres
